About Us
Facebook
Instagram
Welcome to Shipwreck Island Waterpark – Where Family Fun Sets Sail!
Shipwreck Island Waterpark has been a beloved part of Panama City Beach since 1976. It all began with the thrilling Zoom Flume waterslide, and by 1983, the merging of the Zoom Flume and Rapids attractions launched the park’s transformation into a full-scale, tropical-themed waterpark.
Today, Shipwreck Island spans 15 beautifully landscaped acres, offering the perfect mix of excitement and relaxation for guests of all ages. From heart-pounding slides and wave pools to lazy rivers and splash zones for little ones, there’s something for every kind of adventurer.
Our commitment to delivering a top-tier guest experience goes beyond the attractions. From delicious food and refreshing drinks to a professionally trained aquatics team focused on safety and service, every detail is designed to make your visit memorable.
Whether you’re making your first trip or coming back for more, Shipwreck Island Waterpark is your go-to destination for family fun in Panama City Beach.
Our Mission
Our mission is to bring people together through spontaneous, unforgettable moments of fun.
Core Values
Our Core Values drive our culture. We work to create a culture of growth, continuous improvement, safety, learning, and fun!
Safety First
Family Fun
Splashtastic Service
Corporate Social Responsibility
Environmental | Social | Governance
We set goals and implement park improvements to demonstrate our commitment to environmental, social, and governance factors.
Join the Crew
The Team for People who love Fun
Shipwreck Island is a favorite place to work! From food service to ticketers, office staff to ride operators, we’re always looking for talent to join our team. Come join our Team and work in a fun, exciting and energetic environment.
01.
find your spot
Ready to get started? Click the button below to explore where we’re hiring. Our job portal includes opportunities at Shipwreck Island, Boomers Parks, and Big Kahuna’s – so be sure to filter by location!
02.
apply online
Polish up your resume and submit your application – we make it all easy online.
03.
be prepared
Our team does our best to follow up on, we appreciate your application. If you like to smile and enjoy being around people, then this is a great job for you!
View Job Openings

Cabana Options
Reserve Your Spot for Relaxation
Relax and enjoy a luxurious, private Cabana at the Waterpark. Cabanas are reserved on a first-come, first-serve basis. Admission Ticket(s) are NOT included with Cabana Rental fee.
Save $40 on a Cabana!
Use promo code
VIPSAVE40
during checkout to save $40 on your cabana reservation.
Admission Ticket(s) are not included with cabana rental fee and are sold separately.

Each Cabana is a private space where you can relax as you play the day away. Located near some of Shipwreck Island’s most popular attractions, Skull Island and the Wave Pool.
Our Cabanas are your personal retreat for an unforgettable day of splashing, sliding, and soaking up the sun.
Located by the Wave Pool and Skull Island
